sen.j: 登録有形民俗文化財（とうろくゆうけいみんぞくぶんかざい）は、文部科学大臣によって文化財登録原簿に登録されている。
sen.e: Registered tangible folk cultural properties are registered on the cultural property registry ledger by the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Registered tangible folk cultural properties are registered on the cultural property registry ledger by the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.
Registered tangible folk cultural properties are registered on the cultural property registry ledger by the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.

sen.j: それらは保存と活用が特に必要とされた有形の民俗文化財のことである。
sen.e: These tangible folk cultural properties are considered that preservation and application are especially necessary.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: These tangible folk cultural properties are considered especially worthy of preservation and application.
These tangible folk cultural properties are considered especially worthy of preservation and application.

sen.j: 2004年の文化財保護法改正により、1996年に創設された有形文化財（建造物）の文化財登録制度を拡充し、有形の民俗文化財も登録の対象としたものである。
sen.e: When the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties was revised in 2004, the cultural property registration system of the tangible cultural properties (architecture), established in 1996, was expanded, and tangible folk cultural properties became the subject to registry.

When the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties was revised in 2004, the cultural property registration system of the tangible cultural properties (architecture), established in 1996, was expanded and tangible folk cultural properties became subject to registry.

When the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties was revised in 2004, the cultural property registration system of the tangible cultural properties (architecture), established in 1996, was expanded and tangible folk cultural properties became subject to registry.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 登録制度創設、拡充の背景
sen.e: The establishment of registration system and the background of expansion
The establishment of registration system and the background of expansion
The establishment of registration system and the background of expansion

sen.j: 1996年の文化財保護法改正により、従来の文化財指定制度を補完するものとして、近代の文化財等を保護するため、届出制と指導・助言・勧告を基本とする緩やかな保護措置を講じて、所有者の自主的な保護に期待する文化財登録制度が創設された。
sen.e: Based on the revision of the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties in 1996, the cultural property registration system was established to complement the previous system; in order to protect a modern cultural property etc., a property owner's autonomous protection is expected through the liberal protection measures based on reporting system, instruction, suggestion and recommendation.

Based on the revision of the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties in 1996, the cultural property registration system was established to complement the previous system; in order to protect a modern cultural property etc., a property owner's autonomous protection is expected through the liberal protection measures based on reporting, instruction, suggestion and recommendation.

Based on the revision of the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties in 1996, the cultural property registration system was established to complement the previous system; in order to protect a modern cultural property etc., a property owner's autonomous protection is expected through the liberal protection measures based on reporting, instruction, suggestion and recommendation.

sen.j: この登録制度は、有形文化財のうち建造物について、登録有形文化財制度として先に導入された。
sen.e: Among tangible cultural properties, the registration system was introduced to architecture in advance as a registry tangible cultural property system.
Among tangible cultural properties, the registration system was introduced to architecture in advance as a tangible cultural property registry system.
Among tangible cultural properties, the registration system was introduced to architecture in advance as a tangible cultural property registry system.

sen.j: 建造物以外の有形の文化財については、生活様式の急激な変化等に伴い残存することが困難な状態にある。
sen.e: Tangible cultural properties other than architecture, are in a difficult situation to survive because of the abrupt change of a lifestyle, etc.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Tangible cultural properties other than architecture are in a difficult situation to survive because of abrupt changes in lifestyle, etc.
Tangible cultural properties other than architecture are in a difficult situation to survive because of abrupt changes in lifestyle, etc.

sen.j: 保存と活用のための措置が特に必要とされる近代の文化財が多数存在している。
sen.e: There are many cultural properties of the modern times that especially require some measure for preservation and application.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: There are many cultural properties of modern times that especially require some measure of preservation and application.
There are many cultural properties of modern times that especially require some measure of preservation and application.

sen.j: これらは、文化財として一定の価値は認められるものの評価が定着しておらず、直ちに従来の指定制度による指定を行うことは困難である。
sen.e: Although they are valued in a certain way, it is difficult to be designated by the conventional designation system at once since their evaluation is not established.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Although they are valued in a certain way, it is difficult to be designated by the conventional designation system at once since their evaluation is not established.
Although they are valued in a certain way, it is difficult to be designated by the conventional designation system at once since their evaluation is not established.

sen.j: しかし放置しておくと消滅等の可能性が高い。
sen.e: However, they may disappear if left alone.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: However, they may disappear if left alone.
However, they may disappear if left alone.

sen.j: そのため早急な保護措置を講ずるため、有形の民俗文化財にも登録制度を拡充した。
sen.e: Therefore, registration system is also introduced to tangible folk cultural properties for an immediate protection measure.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Therefore, registration system is also introduced to tangible folk cultural properties for an immediate protection measure.
Therefore, registration system is also introduced to tangible folk cultural properties for an immediate protection measure.

sen.j: 登録の対象
sen.e: Candidates for registry
Candidates for registry
Candidates for registry

sen.j: 登録の対象となるものは、原則として近代以降に普及したもので、生活用品、工業製品などの生活文化財である。
sen.e: Livelihood cultural properties, such as living wares and industrial commodities, which became popular since modern times in principle, may be candidates for registry.
Livelihood cultural properties, such as living wares and industrial commodities, which became popular since modern times, may be candidates for registry.
Livelihood cultural properties, such as living wares and industrial commodities, which became popular since modern times, may be candidates for registry.

sen.j: 形態、製作技法等において日本国民の生活文化の特色を示すもので典型的なもの、系統的・網羅的に収集されたコレクションであって地域的特色、技術的特色等を示すものが挙げられる。
sen.e: They may be a typical object that show characteristic of the Japanese's life and culture in a shape, a fabrication technique, etc., or a systematical and comprehensive collection that has distinctive features in regionally, technically, etc.

They may be a typical object that shows characteristics of Japanese life and culture in a shape, a fabrication technique, etc., or a systematical and comprehensive collection that has distinctive features regionally or technically.

They may be a typical object that shows characteristics of Japanese life and culture in a shape, a fabrication technique, etc., or a systematical and comprehensive collection that has distinctive features regionally or technically.

sen.j: この登録制度は指定制度を補完するものであるため、登録対象となる有形の民俗文化財は、重要有形民俗文化財や地方公共団体指定の有形民俗文化財でないものに限られる。
sen.e: Because this registration system complements the designation system, registry candidates are restricted to tangible folk cultural properties that are neither important tangible folk cultural properties nor tangible folk cultural properties specified by a local public entity.

Because this registration system complements the designation system, registry candidates are restricted to tangible folk cultural properties that are neither important tangible folk cultural properties nor tangible folk cultural properties specified by a local public entity.

Because this registration system complements the designation system, registry candidates are restricted to tangible folk cultural properties that are neither important tangible folk cultural properties nor tangible folk cultural properties specified by a local public entity.

sen.j: 登録有形民俗文化財として登録された後、国または地方公共団体の有形民俗文化財として指定を受けた場合は、登録有形民俗文化財としての登録は抹消される。
sen.e: When a registered tangible folk cultural property is designated as tangible folk cultural property of a state or a local public entity, the registry as registry tangible folk cultural properties is cancelled.
When a registered tangible folk cultural property is designated as tangible folk cultural property of a state or a local public entity, the registry as tangible folk cultural property is canceled.
When a registered tangible folk cultural property is designated as tangible folk cultural property of a state or a local public entity, the registry as tangible folk cultural property is canceled.

sen.j: ただし、地方公共団体の有形民俗文化財として指定を受けた場合において、その登録有形民俗文化財について、その保存及び活用のための措置を講ずる必要があり、かつ、その所有者の同意がある場合は、例外的に登録を抹消しないことができる。
sen.e: However, when it is designated as tangible folk cultural properties of a local public entity, the registry may not be cancelled exceptionally provided that the registered tangible folk cultural property needs some measure for its preservation and application, and the owner agrees with.

However, when it is designated as tangible folk cultural property of a local public entity, the registry may not be canceled exceptionally provided that the registered tangible folk cultural property needs some measure for its preservation and application, and the owner agrees.

However, when it is designated as tangible folk cultural property of a local public entity, the registry may not be canceled exceptionally provided that the registered tangible folk cultural property needs some measure for its preservation and application, and the owner agrees.

sen.j: 2004年の文化財保護法改正においては、登録有形文化財制度の登録の対象に美術工芸品を追加された。
sen.e: When the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties was revised in 2004, art craftworks are added to the candidates for registered tangible folk cultural properties.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: When the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties was revised in 2004, art craftworks were added to the candidates for registered tangible folk cultural properties.
When the Law for the Protection of Cultural Properties was revised in 2004, art craftworks were added to the candidates for registered tangible folk cultural properties.

sen.j: また記念物（史跡・名勝・天然記念物関係）についても従来の指定制度を補完するものとして登録制度が導入された。
sen.e: Moreover, the registration system was introduced to monuments (historic sites, scenic spots and natural monuments) in order to complement the conventional designation system.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Moreover, the registration system was introduced to monuments (historic sites, scenic spots and natural monuments) in order to complement the conventional designation system.
Moreover, the registration system was introduced to monuments (historic sites, scenic spots and natural monuments) in order to complement the conventional designation system.

sen.j: 登録された記念物は、登録記念物と呼ばれる。
sen.e: The monuments that are registered are called registered monuments.
The monuments that are registered are called registered monuments.
The monuments that are registered are called registered monuments.

sen.j: 登録の基準
sen.e: Criteria for registration
Criteria for registration
Criteria for registration

sen.j: 「登録有形民俗文化財登録基準」では、登録の基準を次のいずれかに該当するもの、としている。
sen.e: According to the "Registered tangible folk cultural properties registration criteria", it shall meet one of the following criteria.
According to the "Registered tangible folk cultural properties registration criteria", it shall meet one of the following criteria.
According to the "Registered tangible folk cultural properties registration criteria", it shall meet one of the following criteria.

sen.j: 形態、製作技法、用法等において我が国民の生活文化の特色を示すもので典型的なもの
sen.e: A typical object that show characteristic of the Japanese's life and culture in a shape, a fabrication technique, a usage etc.
A typical object that shows characteristics of Japanese life and culture in a shape, a fabrication technique, a usage etc.
A typical object that shows characteristics of Japanese life and culture in a shape, a fabrication technique, a usage etc.

sen.j: 有形の民俗文化財であって、その目的、内容等が歴史的変遷、時代的特色、地域的特色、技術的特色、生活様式の特色又は職能の様相を示すもの
sen.e: A tangible folk cultural property whose purpose, details, etc. indicate the historical transition, the historical characteristic, the regional characteristic, the technical characteristic, the lifestyle characteristic or the vocational aspect.

A tangible folk cultural property whose purpose, details, etc. indicate the historical transition, the historical characteristic, the regional characteristic, the technical characteristic, the lifestyle characteristic or the vocational aspect.

A tangible folk cultural property whose purpose, details, etc. indicate the historical transition, the historical characteristic, the regional characteristic, the technical characteristic, the lifestyle characteristic or the vocational aspect.

sen.j: 我が国民以外の人々に係る有形の民俗文化財又はその収集であって、我が国民の生活文化との関連を示すもののうち重要なもの
sen.e: An important tangible folk cultural property or its collection of foreign people that has relationship with Japanese's life and culture.
An important tangible folk cultural property of foreign people or its collection that has a relationship with Japanese life and culture.
An important tangible folk cultural property of foreign people or its collection that has a relationship with Japanese life and culture.

sen.j: 登録有形民俗文化財の一覧
sen.e: The list of registered tangible folk cultural properties
The list of registered tangible folk cultural properties
The list of registered tangible folk cultural properties

sen.j: 第1回の登録は2006年（平成18年）3月15日付けで行われ、若狭めのうほか2件が登録された。
sen.e: The first registration was held on March 15, 2006; Wakasa agate and two other items were registered.
The first registration was held on March 15, 2006; Wakasa agate and two other items were registered.
The first registration was held on March 15, 2006; Wakasa agate and two other items were registered.

sen.j: 2009年（平成21年）3月11日に第4回の登録が行われた。
sen.e: The fourth registration was held on March 11, 2009.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: The fourth registration was held on March 11, 2009.
The fourth registration was held on March 11, 2009.

sen.j: 同日現在、以下の12件が登録されている。
sen.e: The following twelve items have been registrated by the same day.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: The following twelve items have been registered by the same day.
The following twelve items have been registered by the same day.
